text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: ――The countdown begins! 10, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4――!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (―I should be running far away, but I can hear her breath. I'm sure it's because……I remember it on the grass.)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (We don't mesh at all. But there's one time when it fits perfectly. It's on the turf.)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ――She's got perfect control of her pace. She's probably keeping her initial momentum. Me too……!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …I'm sure she's right on top of you. She's probably swelling up in the corner, so… I need to make it bigger too!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Crap! Did I overexert myself?! …No, it's not a problem. I know her. At this rate…!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (It's true that we're bumpy. That's why we're seriously clashing, and each time…… we're firmly in sync.)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (That annoyed me, irritated me…… I absolutely didn't want to lose! No matter how much I denied it…… with words! We――)

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: She's my rival!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Wow…! They're in perfect sync! We can't see each other at all!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I see. So they're racing right now.

text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: ――Now, soon! Two Santas are trying to reach the top……!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaah…!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Look! Santa has made it to the top, and the entirety of Harron Tower is lit up!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Light radiates from the top and pours down on us like a present!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Wow, that's amazing! It's so pretty! Thanks, Santa!

text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: U-Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …! Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Vodka!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Thank you both for your hard work. You've done a wonderful job as an official ambassador. They were very grateful to you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Brian, Laurel, and I will help you clean up. You can rest here and enjoy the night view.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? We'll help too!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Do I look inhuman enough to put you guys to work for a great service?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …I'd like to thank you too. Thank you for making the event a lot more exciting. We can have a nice chat once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …………Umm… What do you mean……talk to each other? Haha……

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I said I'm sorry! I said it was lame, and made fun of you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I hit her. I… I actually…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …It's fine. It's not like you to be stubborn.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I said something terrible. I think… I felt the same way as you.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: So I'm sorry too. Let's end this. Okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …No. I'll say it.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Even if this happens again, I'll understand! I… I really don't like you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Hey, what are you—

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: But I don't want to lose because it pisses me off. It's because you're here that I'm stronger.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: To me, you… make me want to win… I hate to admit it, but you're the person I want to be.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …What about you? What do you think of me?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Aren't you an idiot?! N-No, I'm not!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Say it! …Say it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …It's the same. I think of you as my one and only rival.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Also! Let me just say this! That outfit… It really suits you!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …! Hmph. You're cool, too…
